item.title: Quindar Tones - The Famous NASA Beep
item.author: email@example.com (The Inner Machinations Of My Mind)
item.description:
Houston, Apollo 11. Comm Check.

Origins

Today is July 20th, 2025. 56 years ago today, humanity took its first baby steps on an incredible journey to another world. Reaching the moon was no small task. Set out following President John F. Kennedy’s challenge to the nation, NASA accomplished what no other nation to date has done. In my spare time, I participate in an Amateur Radio program called NASA On The Air. This organization participates in radio activations to commemorate milestones in American and Human spaceflight. Including all of the Apollo Missions.

item.title: And you may find yourself behind the wheel of a large automobile
item.author: email@example.com (The Inner Machinations Of My Mind)
item.description:
Talking Heads said it best:

And you may find yourself living in a shotgun shack

And you may find yourself in another part of the world

And you may find yourself behind the wheel of a large automobile

And you may find yourself in a beautiful house, with a beautiful wife

And you may ask yourself, Well, how did I get here?
